titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of May as Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome Awareness Month to increase the knowledge of this little-known, potentially fatal, genetic disease.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 4/4/2011--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome Awareness Month. Honors those suffering from the Syndrome and encourages scientific research and funding to find a cure.
